welcome.title: Welcome to a decentralized future
welcome.subTitle: Enter the world of the internet where you utilize it how it should be

intro.title1: Ox21 combines the latest in decentralized communication, payments and file sharing
intro.title2: Using a modern blockchain storage technology as it\’s backbone
intro.title3: Ox21 also works through Bluetooth, NFC, and WiFi
intro.SignIn: Sign in to an Existing account

secure_account_step_one.title: Back up Mnemonic phrase
secure_account_step_one.subTitle: These 12 words are your mnemonic phrase. They are the key to your wallet. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You\'ll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in the order of the words shown before on the previous screen) on the next step.
secure_account_step_one.tapContainerTitle: Tap to reveal your seed phrase
secure_account_step_one.tapContainerSubTitle: Make sure no one is watching your screen

secure_account_step_two.title: Confirm Mnemonic Phrase
secure_account_step_two.subTitle: Select each word in the order it was presented to you on the previous screen.
secure_account_step_two.maximumAttempt: You have reached the maximum attempts limit
Selected Words didn\'t match. 1 attempt left.

createPassword.title: Create Password
createPassword.subTitle: This password will unlock your Ox21 account only on this phone.
createPassword.signInToggle: Sign in with Face ID/Touch ID?
createPassword.13yearoldertext: I am 13 years or older to user this app.
createPassword.checkboxText: I understand that Ox21 cannot recover this password for me.
createPassword.tip1: Use at least 8 characters—the more characters, the better.
createPassword.tip2: A mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters.
createPassword.tip3: A mixture of letters and numbers.
createPassword.tip4: Inclusion of at least one special character, e.g., ! @ # ? ]
createPassword.alertMsgConfrimPass: The password does not match the original input
createPassword.alertPass: Selected Words didn\'t match. $noOfAttemptsLeft attempts left.
createPassword.alert: The Password must have at least 8 characters
createPassword.alert2: Please confirm that you are 13 years or older.

Congratulations.title: Congratulations
Congratulations.subTitle: You\'ve successfully secured your account. Remember to keep your mnemonic phrase safe, it\'s your responsibility!
Congratulations.text2: Ox21 cannot recover your account should you lose it.

signin_mnemonic.title: Sign in using your Mnemonic Phrase

signin_mnemonic.text: By proceeding, you agree to these
signin_mnemonic.alert1: Mnemonic Phrase must be exactly 12 words
signin_mnemonic.alert2: Password must be at least 8 characters

forgot.alert1: Mnemonic phrase must be exactly 12 words
